text: "Aaron's Party (Come Get It)" is the first single off American pop singer Aaron Carter's second studio album of the same name. The song was released on August 1, 2000. The song was able to make it to #35 on the Billboard Hot 100 chart. It was also certified Gold by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA). The song is about Aaron wanting to throw a party to impress his friends and the girl he likes. A music video for the song was released. In the video, Aaron suggests his parents visit his aunt Joan. After they leave, he hosts a party at his house. During the party, people he doesn't know show up and show a flyer that says it's an open house party. The house starts to get destroyed and Aaron dances on a stage in the backyard with backup dancers. He hears a car door close and he panicks, trying to kick people out and cleanup. His parents see the party and yell at Aaron and ground him. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2000 songs Category:Pop songs
title: Aaron's Party (Come Get It) (song)
